alert.note: Alert for Lipscomb; Ochiltree (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 5:07PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Beaver, northwestern Lipscomb and northeastern Ochiltree Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 507 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles south of Booker, or 13 miles east of Perryton, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Perryton, Beaver, Booker, Forgan, Darrouzett, Gate, Knowles, Elmwood, Boyd, Floris, Bryans Corner, Mocane, Slapout and Balko. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
